name: Dizzy Fight
description:
Break into the world of Dizzy Fight - choose your character - a beautiful thief girl, or an ugly zombie, an astronaut, or an office worker, or perhaps a medieval knight - and fight against opponents in picturesque locations.

Each of the characters has their own superpower, such as launching a tyrannosaurus or a sports car at an opponent. Also, each character has their own combo techniques, but in order to use them, you need to score a certain number of points in a fight.
Currently, two game modes are available - against the PC and playing with a friend on the same PC (controller is required for local multiplayer).
A dynamic setting, a fun atmosphere, and vivid emotions are what Dizzy Fight will give you.
